QuestParts.Response2: I’m just here to defend the staging area, I can’t liberate your village without backup.
QuestParts.Response1: Of course! I came here to kick ass and rescue Peasants. Where is your village?
QuestParts.Response3: No, I was sent to clear the farm to the west, if the Demons burn it, half the county will run out of food.
QuestParts.GiverText: Thank god you’re here, our village has been overrun! Please help us!
